actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish a national rangelands rehabilitation and maintenance program.
short_title: National Rangelands Rehabilitation and Maintenance Act

summary.text: National Rangelands Rehabilitation and Maintenance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to develop and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all lands administered by the Bureau of Land Management on which there is, or which are suitable for, domestic livestock grazing. Directs the Secretary to develop and implement a rehabilitation and protection program with respect to such rangelands. Declares the goals of such program to be (1) the correction of the deficiencies in, and the rehabilitation of, inventoried rangelands within 30 years of the enactment of this Act, and (2) the subsequent maintenance or improvement of the productive capacity of such lands consistent with the resource values identified in this Act and with the multiple use, sustained yield concept of land management. Requires the Secretary to prepare a rangelands report one year after enactment of this Act and thereafter at three year intervals.

titles.title: National Rangelands Rehabilitation and Maintenance Act
A bill to establish a national rangelands rehabilitation and maintenance program.
